verses.verse: מִשְׁלֵ֗י <WH4912> The proverbs שְׁלֹ֫מֹ֥ה <WH8010> of Solomon פ בֵּ֣ן <WH1121> son חָ֭כָם <WH2450> A wise יְשַׂמַּח־ <WH8055> maketh a glad אָ֑ב <WH1> father וּבֵ֥ן <WH1121> son כְּ֝סִ֗יל <WH3684> but a foolish תּוּגַ֥ת <WH8424> [is] the heaviness אִמּֽוֹ׃ <WH517> of his mother

לֹא־ <WH3808> not י֭וֹעִילוּ <WH3276> profit אוֹצְר֣וֹת <WH214> Treasures רֶ֑שַׁע <WH7562> of wickedness וּ֝צְדָקָ֗ה <WH6666> nothing but righteousness תַּצִּ֥יל <WH5337> delivereth מִמָּֽוֶת׃ <WH4194> from death

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יַרְעִ֣יב <WH7456> to famish יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> The LORD נֶ֣פֶשׁ <WH5315> the soul צַדִּ֑יק <WH6662> of the righteous וְהַוַּ֖ת <WH1942> the substance רְשָׁעִ֣ים <WH7563> of the wicked יֶהְדֹּֽף׃ <WH1920> but he casteth away

רָ֗אשׁ <WH7326> He becometh poor עֹשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> that dealeth כַף־ <WH3709> hand רְמִיָּ֑ה <WH7423> [with] a slack וְיַ֖ד <WH3027> but the hand חָרוּצִ֣ים <WH2742> of the diligent תַּעֲשִֽׁיר׃ <WH6238> maketh rich

אֹגֵ֣ר <WH103> He that gathereth בַּ֭קַּיִץ <WH7019> in summer בֵּ֣ן <WH1121> son מַשְׂכִּ֑יל <WH7919> [is] a wise נִרְדָּ֥ם <WH7290> [but] he that sleepeth בַּ֝קָּצִ֗יר <WH7105> in harvest בֵּ֣ן <WH1121> [is] a son מֵבִֽישׁ׃ <WH954> that causeth shame

בְּ֭רָכוֹת <WH1293> Blessings לְרֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> [are] upon the head צַדִּ֑יק <WH6662> of the just וּפִ֥י <WH6310> the mouth רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים <WH7563> of the wicked יְכַסֶּ֥ה <WH3680> covereth חָמָֽס׃ <WH2555> but violence
זֵ֣כֶר <WH2143> The memory צַ֭דִּיק <WH6662> of the just לִבְרָכָ֑ה <WH1293> [is] blessed וְשֵׁ֖ם <WH8034> but the name רְשָׁעִ֣ים <WH7563> of the wicked יִרְקָֽב׃ <WH7537> shall rot
חֲכַם־ <WH2450> The wise לֵ֭ב <WH3820> in heart יִקַּ֣ח <WH3947> will receive מִצְוֹ֑ת <WH4687> commandments וֶאֱוִ֥יל <WH191> fool שְׂ֝פָתַ֗יִם <WH8193> but a prating יִלָּבֵֽט׃ <WH3832> shall fall

הוֹלֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> walketh בַּ֭תֹּם <WH8537> uprightly יֵ֣לֶךְ <WH1980> walks בֶּ֑טַח <WH983> surely וּמְעַקֵּ֥שׁ <WH6140> but he that perverteth דְּ֝רָכָ֗יו <WH1870> his ways יִוָּדֵֽעַ׃ <WH3045> shall be known

קֹ֣רֵֽץ <WH7169> He that winketh עַ֭יִן <WH5869> with the eye יִתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> causeth עַצָּ֑בֶת <WH6094> sorrow וֶאֱוִ֥יל <WH191> fool שְׂ֝פָתַ֗יִם <WH8193> but a prating יִלָּבֵֽט׃ <WH3832> shall fall

מְק֣וֹר <WH4726> [man is] a well חַ֭יִּים <WH2416> of life פִּ֣י <WH6310> The mouth צַדִּ֑יק <WH6662> of a righteous וּפִ֥י <WH6310> the mouth רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים <WH7563> of the wicked יְכַסֶּ֥ה <WH3680> covereth חָמָֽס׃ <WH2555> but violence

שִׂ֭נְאָה <WH8135> Hatred תְּעוֹרֵ֣ר <WH5782> stirreth up מְדָנִ֑ים <WH4090> strifes וְעַ֥ל <WH5921> and כָּל־ <WH3605> all פְּ֝שָׁעִ֗ים <WH6588> all sins תְּכַסֶּ֥ה <WH3680> covereth אַהֲבָֽה׃ <WH160> but love

בְּשִׂפְתֵ֣י <WH8193> In the lips נָ֭בוֹן <WH995> of him that hath understanding תִּמָּצֵ֣א <WH4672> is found חָכְמָ֑ה <WH2451> wisdom וְ֝שֵׁ֗בֶט <WH7626> but a rod לְגֵ֣ו <WH1460> [is] for the back חֲסַר־ <WH2638> of him that is void לֵֽב׃ <WH3820> of understanding

חֲכָמִ֥ים <WH2450> Wise יִצְפְּנוּ־ <WH6845> [men] lay up דָ֑עַת <WH1847> knowledge וּפִֽי־ <WH6310> but the mouth אֱ֝וִיל <WH191> of the foolish מְחִתָּ֥ה <WH4288> destruction קְרֹבָֽה׃ <WH7138> [is] near

ה֣וֹן <WH1952> wealth עָ֭שִׁיר <WH6223> The rich man's קִרְיַ֣ת <WH7151> city עֻזּ֑וֹ <WH5797> [is] his strong מְחִתַּ֖ת <WH4288> the destruction דַּלִּ֣ים <WH1800> of the poor רֵישָֽׁם׃ <WH7389> [is] their poverty
פְּעֻלַּ֣ת <WH6468> The labour צַדִּ֣יק <WH6662> of the righteous לְחַיִּ֑ים <WH2416> [tendeth] to life תְּבוּאַ֖ת <WH8393> the fruit רָשָׁ֣ע <WH7563> of the wicked לְחַטָּֽאת׃ <WH2403> to sin

אֹ֣רַח <WH734> He [is in] the way לְ֭חַיִּים <WH2416> of life שׁוֹמֵ֣ר <WH8104> that keepeth מוּסָ֑ר <WH4148> instruction וְעוֹזֵ֖ב <WH5800> but he that refuseth תּוֹכַ֣חַת <WH8433> reproof מַתְעֶֽה׃ <WH8582> erreth

מְכַסֶּ֣ה <WH3680> He that hideth שִׂ֭נְאָה <WH8135> hatred שִׂפְתֵי־ <WH8193> lips שָׁ֑קֶר <WH8267> [with] lying וּמוֹצִ֥א <WH3318> and he that uttereth דִ֝בָּ֗ה <WH1681> a slander ה֣וּא <WH1931> he כְסִֽיל׃ <WH3684> [is] a fool

בְּרֹ֣ב <WH7230> In the multitude דְּ֭בָרִים <WH1697> of words לֹ֣א <WH3808> not יֶחְדַּל־ <WH2308> there wanteth פָּ֑שַׁע <WH6588> not sin וְחֹשֵׂ֖ךְ <WH2820> but he that refraineth שְׂפָתָ֣יו <WH8193> his lips מַשְׂכִּֽיל׃ <WH7919> [is] wise

כֶּ֣סֶף <WH3701> silver נִ֭בְחָר <WH977> [is as] choice לְשׁ֣וֹן <WH3956> The tongue צַדִּ֑יק <WH6662> of the just לֵ֖ב <WH3820> the heart רְשָׁעִ֣ים <WH7563> of the wicked כִּמְעָֽט׃ <WH4592> [is] little worth

שִׂפְתֵ֣י <WH8193> The lips צַ֭דִּיק <WH6662> of the righteous יִרְע֣וּ <WH7462> feed רַבִּ֑ים <WH7227> many וֶֽ֝אֱוִילִ֗ים <WH191> but fools בַּחֲסַר־ <WH2638> for want לֵ֥ב <WH3820> of wisdom יָמֽוּתוּ׃ <WH4191> die

בִּרְכַּ֣ת <WH1293> The blessing יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> of the LORD הִ֣יא <WH1931> that תַעֲשִׁ֑יר <WH6238> it maketh rich וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> no יוֹסִ֖ף <WH3254> and he addeth עֶ֣צֶב <WH6089> no sorrow עִמָּֽהּ׃ <WH5973> is like

כִּשְׂח֣וֹק <WH7814> [It is] as sport לִ֭כְסִיל <WH3684> to a fool עֲשׂ֣וֹת <WH6213> to do זִמָּ֑ה <WH2154> mischief וְ֝חָכְמָ֗ה <WH2451> hath wisdom לְאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> but a man תְּבוּנָֽה׃ <WH8394> of understanding

מְגוֹרַ֣ת <WH4034> The fear רָ֭שָׁע <WH7563> of the wicked הִ֣יא <WH1931> he תְבוֹאֶ֑נּוּ <WH935> it shall come וְתַאֲוַ֖ת <WH8378> upon him but the desire צַדִּיקִ֣ים <WH6662> of the righteous יִתֵּֽן׃ <WH5414> shall be granted

כַּעֲב֣וֹר <WH5674> passeth ס֭וּפָה <WH5492> As the whirlwind וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> is no רָשָׁ֑ע <WH7563> so [is] the wicked וְ֝צַדִּ֗יק <WH6662> no [more] but the righteous יְס֣וֹד <WH3247> foundation עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> [is] an everlasting

כַּחֹ֤מֶץ ׀ <WH2558> As vinegar לַשִּׁנַּ֗יִם <WH8127> to the teeth וְכֶעָשָׁ֥ן <WH6227> and as smoke לָעֵינָ֑יִם <WH5869> to the eyes כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> So הֶ֝עָצֵ֗ל <WH6102> so [is] the sluggard לְשֹׁלְחָֽיו׃ <WH7971> to them that send

יִרְאַ֣ת <WH3374> The fear יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> of the LORD תּוֹסִ֣יף <WH3254> prolongeth יָמִ֑ים <WH3117> days וּשְׁנ֖וֹת <WH8141> but the years רְשָׁעִ֣ים <WH7563> of the wicked תִּקְצֹֽרְנָה׃ <WH7114> shall be shortened

תּוֹחֶ֣לֶת <WH8431> The hope צַדִּיקִ֣ים <WH6662> of the righteous שִׂמְחָ֑ה <WH8057> [shall be] gladness וְתִקְוַ֖ת <WH8615> but the expectation רְשָׁעִ֣ים <WH7563> of the wicked תֹּאבֵֽד׃ <WH6> shall perish

מָע֣וֹז <WH4581> [is] strength לַ֭תֹּם <WH8537> to the upright דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> The way יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וּ֝מְחִתָּ֗ה <WH4288> but destruction לְפֹ֣עֲלֵי <WH6466> [shall be] to the workers אָֽוֶן׃ <WH205> of iniquity

צַדִּ֣יק <WH6662> The righteous לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> shall never בַּל־ <WH1077> lest יִמּ֑וֹט <WH4131> be removed וּ֝רְשָׁעִ֗ים <WH7563> but the wicked לֹ֣א <WH3808> will not יִשְׁכְּנוּ־ <WH7931> shall not inhabit אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> the earth

פִּֽי־ <WH6310> The mouth צַ֭דִּיק <WH6662> of the just יָנ֣וּב <WH5107> bringeth forth חָכְמָ֑ה <WH2451> wisdom וּלְשׁ֥וֹן <WH3956> tongue תַּ֝הְפֻּכ֗וֹת <WH8419> but the froward תִּכָּרֵֽת׃ <WH3772> shall be cut out

שִׂפְתֵ֣י <WH8193> The lips צַ֭דִּיק <WH6662> of the righteous יֵדְע֣וּן <WH3045> know רָצ֑וֹן <WH7522> what is acceptable וּפִ֥י <WH6310> but the mouth רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים <WH7563> of the wicked תַּהְפֻּכֽוֹת׃ <WH8419> [speaketh] frowardness
